solution_line_template: If Patricia has {num_barrels} barrels and each barrel has {gallons_per_barrel} gallons, then in total she needs {num_barrels}*{gallons_per_barrel}=<<{num_barrels}*{gallons_per_barrel}={total_gallons}>>{total_gallons} gallons

If the faucet can provide {flow_rate} gallons every minute, then she will need {total_gallons}/{flow_rate}=<<{total_gallons}/{flow_rate}={time_to_fill}>>{time_to_fill} minutes to fill all {num_barrels} barrels
